sourcesContent:
<template>
  <header></header>
</template>

<script>
import axios from "axios";

export default {
  data() {
    return {
      phpVariable: "",
    };
  },
  mounted() {
    axios
      .get("@components/request.php")
      .then((response) => {
        this.phpVariable = response.data;
      })
      .catch((error) => {
        console.error("error from request in API", error);
      });
  },
};
</script>

<!--the scss-->
<style scoped lang="scss">
h3 {
  margin: 40px 0 0;
}

ul {
  list-style-type: none;
  padding: 0;
}

li {
  display: inline-block;
  margin: 0 10px;
}

a {
  color: #42b983;
}
</style>
